title: Get rid of all other game modes just leave URF permanent.

replies.body:
I like Urf, but it would lose it's novelty rather quickly if it was the only game mode.

Now, if you were to go for something like

"Make RGM Last All Week Instead of Just the Weekend"  I'd probably agree. More Urf for me. Even if I give pretty much no yiffs about the rest of the game modes. Least they could do is Hexakill on SR instead of TT. Or revert certain changes to Ascension.
Would rather have doombots as the only mode.
Or they could just cycle the bonus game modes daily so you can look forward to URF Fridays
